definition: to let go/to cast/to let loose/to discharge/to give expression to
dawn/morning/daybreak/day/dan, female roles in Chinese opera (traditionally played by specialized male actors)

sentences.english: Satan and the rebel angels have been roundly defeated.
sentences.chinese: 撒旦和叛亂天使們被徹底擊敗了。

sentences.english: The only thing feared by the spawn of Satan?

sentences.chinese: 你知道的，是那些撒旦教徒。

sentences.english: Satan pocketed a bottle and shuffled toward the car.
sentences.chinese: 撒旦將一隻瓶子揣進口袋，拖着雙腳走向車子。

sentences.english: Of course, perhaps even more troubling is the satanic parallel as well.
sentences.chinese: 當然，或許更令人頭疼的是在撒旦身上進行的類比。

sentences.english: Satan or the Red Dragon is under God's control for 1,000 years.
sentences.chinese: 紅龍，也就是撒旦，被困在神的控制下一千年。

sentences.english: Satan is the great tempter of mankind.
sentences.chinese: 撒旦是人類最大的誘惑者。

sentences.english: The Red Dragon is one of the names of Satan.
sentences.chinese: 那紅龍是對撒旦的另一個稱號。

sentences.english: All you needed to become a Satanist was an effort of will.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想成爲撒旦的信徒，只需一個邪惡的念頭就成。
上帝發明同居，撒旦發明婚姻。

sentences.english: Let us learn not to fondle Satan .
sentences.chinese: 讓我們學習不要撫弄撒旦。

sentences.english: Satan is well on the way to success in his goal of enslaving the world.
sentences.chinese: 撒旦的辦法是在他成功的目標奴化世界。

sentences.english: If you are holding onto a grudge or bitterness, Satan will be able to push you around.
sentences.chinese: 如果你持有妒忌和怨恨，撒旦將不離你左右。

sentences.english: "No, you have my word as a gentleman," said Satan.
sentences.chinese: “不，我訂的是君子協議，”撒旦說。

sentences.english: We can blame the devil for making Adam and Eve sin.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以指責撒旦讓亞當夏娃犯罪。

sentences.english: When Satan tempts me to despair.

definition: variant of 撒旦[Sa1 dan4], Satan or Shaitan
Lucifer (Satan's name before his fall in Jewish and Christian mythology)
Holy Father/God the Father (in the Christian Trinity)
Cain (name)/Cain (biblical character), a figure of Judeo-Christian-Muslim mythology
